sentences.en: A semblance of normality has returned with people going to work and shops re-opening.
sentences.cn: 随着人们开始上班，商店重新开张，表面上一切又恢复了正常。

sentences.en: After the war, life returned to a semblance of normality.
sentences.cn: 战后，生活稍微恢复了正常。

sentences.en: At least a semblance of normality has been restored to parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 该国的部分地区至少已经恢复了表面的常态。

sentences.en: By this time some semblance of order had been restored.
sentences.cn: 到这时,秩序在表面上已有所恢复.

sentences.en: He bears the semblance of an angel and the heart of a devil.
He tried to restore some semblance of normality to their home life.
sentences.cn: 他力图使他们的家庭生活恢复正常.

sentences.en: He was sad, but his face had the semblance of a smile.
sentences.cn: 他很伤心, 但脸上露出微笑的表情.

sentences.en: Her semblance of anger frightened the children.
sentences.cn: 她生气的样子使孩子们感到害怕.

sentences.en: His left eye moved with just the semblance of a wink.
sentences.cn: "他的左眼牵动了一下,算是眨眼了.

sentences.en: It was not until the early 1840 s that a semblance of confidence in business was restored.
sentences.cn: 直到十九世纪四十年代初,才恢复了对商业的表面信任.

sentences.en: Lily shook her head with a charming semblance of regret.
sentences.cn: 丽莉摇摇头,妩媚地表示遗憾.

sentences.en: Rear Admiral Spruance, issuing order after order on the TBS, finally regained a semblance of control.
sentences.cn: 海军少将斯普鲁恩斯通过短程无线电对讲机发布一道又一道命令, 表面上总算重新控制了局面.

sentences.en: She was trying to get her thoughts back into some semblance of order .
sentences.cn: 她想稍微理出个头绪来。

sentences.en: The ceasefire brought about a semblance of peace.
sentences.cn: 停火协定带来了表面的和平。

sentences.en: They had nursed Peter back to some semblance of health.
sentences.cn: 在他们的照料下，彼得貌似恢复了健康。

sentences.en: With it , even the semblance of a fit in his clothes.
sentences.cn: 这样一来, 连他的衣服也显得很不合身了.

sentences.en: Your mother bears the semblance of yourself.
sentences.cn: 你的母亲有你的相似之处.

trans.tran_cn: 外表，外观，类似，假装，副本，拷贝
trans.tran_en: If there is a semblance of a particular condition or quality, it appears to exist, even though this may be a false impression
